jobs.title: Middle/Senior Backend Engineer (Java/ MySQL/ Spring)
jobs.location: Quận Bình Thạnh, Hồ Chí Minh
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
Trách nhiệm công việc
Operate, develop and optimize back-end systems (Java /Spring framework /SQL).
Responsible for managing, operating and optimizing server and database systems.
Receive, analyze and develop functions as required, ensure code quality and maintain functional integrity.
Monitor and troubleshoot servers and databases through logging and alerting tools.
Configure, deploy, and manage physical (on-premise) or cloud AWS servers.
Research and develop new technology to increase project efficiency.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or relevant fields.
From 3 - 7 years of hands-on experience in using Java to design and develop WEB applications.
Upper-intermediate English is a must, including 4 skills: reading, writing, speaking and listening (able to work in English-speaking environment).
Experience working with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra). Proficient in ORM (JPA, Hibernate), query optimization, and managing cloud databases (AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL). Skilled in schema migration (Flyway, Liquibase) and performance tuning (HikariCP, replication, partitioning, backup & recovery).
Proficient in developing RESTful APIs using Spring Boot or JVM languages (Kotlin, Scala). Skilled in caching, authentication (JWT, OAuth2, Keycloak), and third-party integrations. Experienced in API documentation (Swagger/OpenAPI), reactive libraries (Feign, RestTemplate, WebClient), and API gateways (Kong, Zuul, Spring Cloud Gateway).
Experience deploying and monitoring in cloud environments with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD. Familiar with Git and SVN.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities;
Experienced in ERP/CRM functional development and selecting suitable tech solutions for scalable, high-performance systems
EducationDegreeBachelor in Information System, Infrastructure, Information TechnologyCertificationPhúc lợi dành cho bạnIncome & Achievement

Full SHUI as Vietnamese Law
Competitive salary, salary review once a year
13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus
MVP and Shining star awards at the end of year

Workplace Happiness

Premium Private Medical Insurance PVI and annual health check
15-day annual leave, Christmas leave and 90-min menstrual leave for women
Company trip, YEP and monthly gathering time
Gifts on special occasion and fully stocked snack corner
Sponsored training courses and book purchase quarterly
Be well-equipped with new working equipment
Global and professional working environment

jobs.title: Tester/QA/QC
jobs.location: Quận Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
Trách nhiệm công việc
Analyze and understand business and technical requirements and work with the project managers, the product owner;
Collaborate in the developer to test developed modules in a structured and successful way;
Develop, execute and review test cases based on functional, technical and usability requirements;
Create, execute and review test cases on functional and non-functional requirements;
Manage and report on your own test deliverables and test execution;
Create and manage defects, along with evaluating severity and impact on the solution and scope;
Take responsibility for certifying the quality of the solution;
Plan and organize your own work and accurately report issues and progress in a timely manner;
Identify areas for personal development;
Report testing status and test results to superior (Product Owner or Direct manager) accurately and in timely manner;
Daily scrum meeting;
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
At least 2+ years in software/web application testing.
Manual Testing:

Strong understanding of test case creation, execution, and defect reporting.
Ability to perform exploratory testing and usability evaluations.


Automated Testing:

Experience with test automation tools (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, Playwright or similar frameworks).
Familiarity with writing automated test scripts and integrating them into CI/CD pipelines.


API Testing:

Hands-on experience testing backend APIs (using tools like Postman, REST Assured, or similar).
Understanding of RESTful API principles and common response patterns.


Technical Knowledges:

Familiarity with the technologies used in our stack: C#, PHP, Typescript and React.
Basic understanding of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) for frontend testing.
Ability to work with SQL databases to verify data integrity and perform backend testing.


Testing Methodologies & Tools:

Knowledge of software testing methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum, Waterfall).
Proficiency in using bug/issue tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, Trello, or similar).
Familiarity with performance testing concepts and, optionally, tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner).


Clear and Concise Writing:

Ability to write detailed yet succinct bug reports and testing notes.
Use of structured language and proper formatting to ensure reports are easily understood by both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


Attention to Detail:

Document all relevant information (e.g., steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual results, environment details) accurately.
Capture and include necessary screenshots, logs, and error messages.


Analytical Thinking:

Evaluate and summarize complex issues in a way that highlights root causes and potential impacts.
Provide context in testing notes to facilitate easier troubleshooting and resolution.


Good communication; Fluent English in Verbal.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Opportunity to be a central part of major product transformations.
A collaborative international environment with clear strategic goals.
Competitive compensation and professional growth opportunities
Opportunity to go work on-site in Norway
Work only 7.5 hours per day, from Mon – Fri
Allowances: Lunch, Fuel, and Internet
Company trip, Year End Party
Weekly entertainment activities: Football, Badminton
Monthly events such as birthday party, team building dinner, and other special events
Annual healthcare check-up, medical treatment supports
All insurances according to Vietnamese Labor law
Happy hour every week, unlimited snacks & beverages.

jobs.title: GAME PRODUCT OWNER
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
Chúng tôi là một công ty phát triển game mobile tại Hà Nội, hiện có 50 nhân sự chia thành 3 team sản phẩm (bao gồm Developer, Game Designer, QA, Marketing...). Archer Studio chuyên tạo ra các tựa game chất lượng cao thuộc thể loại casual, hybrid casual và midcore, mang đến trải nghiệm giải trí độc đáo cho người chơi toàn cầu.
Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm một Game Product Owner (Junior trở lên) đam mê, có tư duy chiến lược để quản lý và phát triển các tựa game mobile thuộc thể loại casual, hybrid casual, với trọng tâm vào Idle Tycoon, Role-Playing Game (RPG), hoặc Tower Defense (TD). Vai trò này sẽ chịu trách nhiệm từ khâu ý tưởng ban đầu, phát triển sản phẩm, ra mắt và duy trì sau ra mắt, đảm bảo chất lượng và sự thành công của game trên thị trường toàn cầu trong môi trường Scrum.Trách nhiệm công việc1. Xây dựng tầm nhìn và chiến lược sản phẩm

Xác định tầm nhìn rõ ràng cho tựa game, phù hợp với mục tiêu của studio và xu hướng thị trường casual, hybrid casual, đặc biệt là Idle Tycoon, RPG, TD.
Lên chiến lược sản phẩm và kế hoạch sản xuất dài hạn, cân bằng giữa các mục tiêu ngắn hạn (ra mắt tính năng) và dài hạn (mở rộng nội dung).
Nghiên cứu thị trường, phân tích đối thủ cạnh tranh và hành vi người chơi để đề xuất các tính năng đổi mới và cải tiến sản phẩm.
Chuyển hóa ý tưởng cấp cao (ví dụ: Gameplay Mechanics, Game Economy, Narrative) thành yêu cầu cụ thể, dễ triển khai.

2. Quản lý Product Backlog và phát triển sản phẩm

Tạo, quản lý và sắp xếp thứ tự ưu tiên Product Backlog, đảm bảo các hạng mục rõ ràng, khả thi và phù hợp với tầm nhìn game.
Viết User Stories chi tiết, tiêu chí chấp nhận và yêu cầu kỹ thuật cho các tính năng (ví dụ: Tower Upgrade System, In-app Purchases, Character Progression).
Phân chia các tính năng phức tạp thành nhiệm vụ nhỏ gọn cho các Sprint (thường 2-4 tuần).
Tinh chỉnh Product Backlog thường xuyên dựa trên phản hồi người chơi, dữ liệu phân tích và ý kiến đội ngũ.

3. Hợp tác trong Scrum

Làm việc chặt chẽ với đội ngũ phát triển (Game Designer, Developer, Artist, QA) để đảm bảo chất lượng đầu ra của sản phẩm.
Tham gia các sự kiện Scrum: Sprint Planning, Daily Stand-up, Sprint Review, Retrospectives để đảm bảo tiến độ và chất lượng.
Phối hợp với Game Designer để tinh chỉnh Gameplay Mechanics, Game Economy và Retention Strategy.
Hỗ trợ Scrum Master giải quyết các trở ngại, tối ưu hóa hiệu suất đội nhóm.

4. Phân tích dữ liệu và tối ưu hóa Player Experience

Phân tích dữ liệu người chơi (DAU, Retention, ARPPU) để hiểu hành vi, nhu cầu và tối ưu hóa Player Experience.
Sử dụng dữ liệu và biểu đồ để đưa ra các quyết định dựa trên dữ liệu, cải thiện tính năng và chiến lược In-app Purchases.
Theo dõi phản hồi người chơi và dữ liệu thử nghiệm để định hướng ưu tiên phát triển.
Thiết kế chiến lược kiếm tiền (In-app Purchases, In-app Ads, Limited-time Events) cân bằng giữa doanh thu và sự hài lòng của người chơi.

5. Theo dõi xu hướng và hỗ trợ chiến lược kinh doanh

Theo dõi xu hướng thị trường game mobile, đặc biệt trong các dòng casual, hybrid casual, Idle Tycoon, RPG, TD, để đề xuất cải tiến sản phẩm.
Tư vấn cho ban lãnh đạo về chiến lược sản phẩm dài hạn, bao gồm mở rộng nội dung và tối ưu hóa hiệu suất game.
Theo dõi KPI sản phẩm (Retention, Revenue, Engagement) và đề xuất cải thiện.
Báo cáo định kỳ về tiến độ phát triển và hiệu suất sản phẩm cho ban lãnh đạo.

6. Hợp tác với đội marketing

Hợp tác với đội marketing để lập kế hoạch ra mắt game, xây dựng chiến lược quảng cáo và chiến dịch cộng đồng.
Đảm bảo các tính năng game hỗ trợ chiến dịch quảng bá và tương tác người chơi.
Quản lý thay đổi phạm vi, thương lượng ưu tiên để tập trung vào các hạng mục có tác động lớn.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Tốt nghiệp đại học ngành Công nghệ Thông tin, Quản trị Kinh doanh, Thiết kế Game hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan.
Có ít nhất 1-2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí Product Owner, Product Manager hoặc tương tự trong ngành phát triển game mobile.
Đã tham gia quá trình sản xuất game từ giai đoạn khởi tạo đến vận hành, lý tưởng nhất là trong các dòng casual, hybrid casual, Idle Tycoon, RPG, TD.
Hiểu biết sâu sắc về thị trường game mobile, đặc biệt là các dòng game casual đến midcore.
Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch tốt, có khả năng xây dựng chiến lược dài hạn và quản lý lộ trình sản phẩm.
Kỹ năng phân tích dữ liệu tốt, có khả năng sử dụng dữ liệu và biểu đồ để đưa ra quyết định dựa trên dữ liệu.
Kinh nghiệm với các thể loại Idle Tycoon, RPG, TD là một lợi thế lớn.

jobs.title: Delivery Manager
jobs.location: Quận Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
We are seeking a Product Delivery Manager to oversee the successful delivery of our products while ensuring customer satisfaction and alignment with business goals. This role plays a crucial part in managing customer expectations, project timelines, pre-sales activities, and tender bidding processes. If you excel in project execution, stakeholder management, and sales support, we invite you to apply.Trách nhiệm công việc
Customer Engagement & Expectation Management
Serve as the primary contact for customers regarding product delivery, timelines, and post-sales inquiries.
Handle customer concerns with confidence, ensuring quick resolution and customer satisfaction.
Conduct regular health checks with customers to address issues and drive improvements.
Provide insights on industry trends and product usage to enhance the customer experience.
Project & Timeline Management
Collect, analyze, and document customer requirements to ensure alignment with product capabilities.
Develop and maintain delivery plans, including scope, milestones, and key deliverables.
Ensure product releases are delivered on time and meet quality expectations.
Identify risks and define contingency plans to mitigate potential delays.
Pre-Sales & Tender Bidding Support
Support the pre-sales process by understanding customer needs and providing technical/product expertise.
Assist in preparing technical proposals, product demonstrations, and solution presentations.
Manage tender submissions, ensuring compliance with customer requirements and bidding criteria.
Work closely with sales and bid management teams to develop winning strategies.
Billing & Monthly Invoicing
Oversee monthly settlements and invoicing, ensuring accurate billing for delivered products/services.
Coordinate with customer project team to push up invoicing process, resolve disputes, and ensure timely collections.
Maintain proper documentation of billing records and agreements for audit purposes.
Process & Workflow Optimization
Implement efficient workflow processes to improve delivery timelines and service quality.
Enhance reporting and tracking systems to monitor project progress and performance.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Strong project management and customer handling skills.
Experience in pre-sales, bid management, or tender processes.
Ability to manage expectations and align customer needs with product roadmaps.
Knowledge of billing and settlement processes is a plus.
Excellent communication, problem-solving, and negotiation skills.
Experience in Japanese BrSE is a plus.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Offering a salary package that is competitive with industry standards and 13rd month salary is applied
Providing Employee Stock Ownership Plan to employees as a part of compensation package
Flexible working arrangements
Annual health check-up is sponsored by the company and FPT care insurance is offered
Opportunity to work directly with customers who are leading companies in Vietnam as well as internationally such as Japan, USA, etc…
The nature of the job is challenging, so you can always promote your capability and interpersonal skills
Monthly Employee recognition and rewards
Offering performance-based bonuses for employees who exceed targets and contribute to the growth of our company.
Dynamic technology environment, open working, democracy, many corporate activities for active people (sports, vacation, team building activities...)

jobs.title: Product Owner (B2B2C)
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
We are on the hunt for a brilliant Innovation Product Owner to join our team and help us drive forward with some out-of-the-box thinking and ideas. As the Innovation Product Owner, you will be responsible for leading the charge on innovative product development, leveraging emerging technologies and pushing the boundaries of what's possible. In fact, we’re looking for someone who can make an impact to the market of food & beverage itself, in (several) innovative projects that connect end consumers and b2b customers.Trách nhiệm công việc
Shape the value: Identify needs & gaps from current market and its distribution, internal stakeholders, and referrable oceans… to create values for the organization through initiations of new digital products, platforms, and technologies. Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to ensure that innovative products and services align with the company's overall strategy and goals.
Own the journeys: You create and define journeys for our end consumers, but also to connect them with the ecosystem of our organization. We don’t digitalize clumsy processes, but bring them to the next level (perhaps having less processes is actually better – it’s your call)
Deliver stuff, digital stuff: Lead (and own the success of) the development of those innovative product ideas and concepts, leveraging emerging technologies and trends (either from the market or Heineken Global). Development teams can be in-house, our Innovation dev hub, or external partner and Global partner, or can buy / rent a technology entirely. It’s up to you!
Understand the customers / users: Develop a deep understanding of customer needs and preferences and use this knowledge to drive the development of products that resonate with our target audience. Depending on projects, users can be a normal beer drinker, or an accountant doing manual work, or a retail owner who barely knows about tech & app. That’s the exciting part of the job.
Be the connector: Work closely with cross-functional teams to plan and execute the development of innovative products and services, using Agile methodologies and tools.
Champion the Innovation: Keep in touch with the world to identify trends, technology and opportunities in the market, and use this information to inform product development decisions.
Live by data: Use data and analytics to track the performance of innovative products and services, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions. Some of your projects might generate invaluable data as well. Fun fact: you can work with a lot of 1st party data, and pionner the transformation game of extracting values from data.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
7-10 years of experience as a Digital Product Owner or similar role, with a proven track record of delivering digital products, services or transformation. A business domain regarding FMCG, B2B business, supply chain, marketing & trade marketing … is a plus.
Strong experience in software development life cycle, especially consumer-facing mobile application and promotion-related softwares. Know enough PowerBI, SQL, Python to explore data indepently. Can estimate how many mandays a feature can get to start arguing with the tech lead.
Strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams to achieve shared goals. In fact, you need to shape your story and convince people to follow!
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization.
Excellent project management skill, capable of driving projects from initiation to closing - sprinkled some pilots here and pivots there.
Good with numbers. Seriously, there’re lots of numbers to crunch and estimate and project. At least you can sell your projects confidently with a wildly-estimated business cases. 
Experience working in an Agile environment, with a relatively thorough understanding of Agile methodologies and tools.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to use data to drive decisions.
A passion for emerging technologies and trends, with a strong understanding of the latest developments in the market.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
A diverse and open working culture, where your true identity is celebrated.
Multiple career opportunities to rotate within Functions or cross-functions.
Your wellbeing will be taken care by our Health & Safety Team since Day 1.
Be a part of our sustainability journey in Brewing the Better Vietnam.
Performance appraisal twice a year to guarantee constructive feedback
Performance bonus (estimated at least 3 months) and 13th month salary bonus
Bao Viet Insurance for employees and family
Annual leave: 18 days/year
Flexible benefit voucher
80% lunch in canteen
Annual team building, Town hall, YEP
Gift for special holidays and sponsor traveling ticket in Tet Holiday
Working hours: from Monday to Friday (8h00-12h00,13h00-17h00)

If you're a creative problem solver with a passion for innovation, we want to hear from you! As our Innovation Product Owner, you'll have the opportunity to work on some truly cutting-edge projects and help us to stay at the forefront of our industry. So, if you're ready to take your career to the next level and join a team that's always pushing the boundaries, apply today and let's get started!Quy trình phỏng vấnVòng 1Screening by phone -> 1st interview with LM: OverviewVòng 22nd interview with LM: Case studyVòng 3Final interview with D&T Director & People Business Partner

jobs.title: Digital Strategy & PMO Lead
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
Role Overview:
We are seeking a dynamic and strategic Digital Strategy & PMO Lead to drive and quantify tangible business value across digital initiatives within the Digital & Technology (D&T) team, ensuring alignment with the D&T growth roadmap and the company’s strategic priorities.
In this role, you will lead value realization efforts for digital projects—translating business cases into financial impact, coordinating initiative delivery, and strengthening program management practices. You will also play a key role in establishing and embedding PMO best practices across the D&T portfolio.
This position requires strong project management capabilities, analytical thinking, and leadership skills. It is ideal for someone with a consulting mindset and a passion for large-scale digital transformation.Trách nhiệm công việcChampion of Business Value Realization & Tracking (50%)

Lead the development of business cases through baseline analysis, assumption validation, and quantitative modeling to estimate financial impact. Outputs will support the Senior Digital Transformation Manager in prioritizing the D&T portfolio and roadmap.
Drive the tracking and monitoring of initiative KPIs to ensure delivery of intended business impact, maintaining thorough documentation for value realization. Coordinate regular KPI communication with D&T and OpCos.
Support value tracking reviews and planning cycles in accordance with enterprise governance (e.g., SNOW system), including accurate impact logging, report preparation, and cascading key insights to D&T leadership.

Project Coordination & PMO Support (30%)

Lead the management of D&T project trackers, timelines, resource monitoring, and project delivery dashboards.
Coordinate planning and execution across cross-functional teams for medium-to-low complexity projects, escalating risks to the Senior Digital Transformation Manager when necessary.
Drive D&T governance and ways of working by standardizing workflows, documentation, action trackers, and initiative briefs—under the guidance of the Senior Digital Transformation Manager.
Identify and lead behavior change plans to strengthen agile practices across D&T, incorporating feedback for iterative improvement and sustained adoption.
Prepare structured meeting materials and coordinate stakeholder input for workshops and strategic planning sessions.

Agile Execution & Delivery Enablement (20%)

Support initiative teams during agile ceremonies (e.g., planning, stand-ups, retrospectives), ensuring clarity of agenda and documentation of outcomes.
Maintain and update agile boards and sprint tracking tools in collaboration with initiative leads.
Consolidate updates and progress reports across sprints and initiatives for visibility and review.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên mônQualifications & Experience

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in business, computer science, information systems, or a related field.
3–5 years of experience in business, analytics, IT, or digital transformation, including approximately 2 years in a leadership or project oversight role.
Experience in strategy, management consulting, or digital transformation preferred.
Demonstrated experience leading cross-functional teams and managing diverse programs.
Familiarity with agile project management methodologies and stage-gate processes.

Skills & Competencies

Strong business acumen with the ability to quantify value creation in financial terms.
Structured problem-solving and 80/20 thinking to analyze complex issues and develop actionable recommendations.
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
A distinctive blend of business, IT, and financial fluency.
Strong analytical capabilities; proficiency in Excel and PowerPoint required.
Strategic mindset with the ability to influence across functions and levels.

Good to Have

Experience with SQL and data querying.
Proficiency in dashboard development using modern BI tools (Power BI preferred).
Experience in change management and communications during digital rollouts.
Understanding of emerging digital technologies and their applications in large enterprises.

What We Offer

Opportunity to lead and shape high-impact digital transformation initiatives.
Close collaboration with senior leadership and exposure to strategic decision-making.
A fast-paced, collaborative environment that supports professional growth.
Clear visibility for advancement within the Digital & Technology function.

jobs.title: IT Help Desk Technician
jobs.location: Quận Tân Bình, Hồ Chí Minh
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
We are seeking a dedicated and proactive IT Help Desk Technician to provide technical support and resolve IT-related issues for internal users. The ideal candidate will ensure smooth operation of IT systems, deliver excellent customer service, and contribute to the efficiency of our IT operations.Trách nhiệm công việc
Provide first-line technical support to employees via phone, email, or in-person, addressing hardware, software, and network issues.
Diagnose and troubleshoot computer systems, printers, peripherals, and software applications.
Escalate complex issues to senior IT staff or relevant teams while tracking progress to resolution.
Install, configure, and maintain computer hardware, software, and peripherals.
Create and manage user accounts, permissions, and passwords in accordance with company policies.
Document all support requests, resolutions, and processes in the ticketing system.
Assist in maintaining IT inventory and ensuring equipment is operational.
Educate users on basic IT processes and best practices to enhance system usage.
Ensure compliance with company IT policies and security protocols.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Associate’s or Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
1-2 years of experience in IT help desk or technical support roles (fresh graduates with strong internships may be considered).
Knowledge and ability to resolve issues with Windows, macOS, Linux operating systems, and common office software.
Basic knowledge of networking (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP) and hardware troubleshooting.
Familiarity with ticketing systems is a plus.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills to assist non-technical users effectively.
Ability to prioritize tasks and work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
Certifications such as CompTIA A+, CCNA, or Microsoft Certified Professional are an advantage.

Working Conditions

Full-time position with standard office hours; occasional after-hours or weekend work may be required for urgent support.
On-site role with potential for hybrid work depending on company policy.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạnOpportunities

Opportunity to gain hands-on experience and develop skills toward a System Administrator role.
Encouragement to explore and implement innovative technologies in daily work and IT systems. 
A supportive environment that encourages personal skill development and professional growth.

Compensation and Benefits

Salary is negotiable during the interview, based on the candidate's qualifications.
13th-month salary and other benefits in accordance with the company’s policies (annual leave, bonuses, etc.).
Full social insurance (SI), health insurance (HI), and unemployment insurance (UI) benefits as per Labor Law.
Annual health check-ups at internationally accredited hospitals.
Special: Health insurance package for employees, including coverage for family members, provided by MSIG – a leading global non-life insurance company.
A friendly and sustainable working environment, where employees are encouraged to maximize their potential, with opportunities for career advancement and development.
Annual salary adjustments based on employee performance and contributions.
Annual company trip and participation in quarterly Happy Hour activities.
Quy trình phỏng vấnVòng 1Interview with HRVòng 2Interview with ManagerVòng 3Negotiation

jobs.description:
About the Role: 
We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Tech Lead to join our development team in Ho Chi Minh City. In this role, you'll lead a talented team of developers and work closely with our Product Manager based in Norway. Your primary focus will be guiding technical decisions, ensuring high-quality development practices, and aligning technology solutions with business objectives.Trách nhiệm công việc
Lead the development team in designing, developing, and maintaining applications built primarily on .NET Core, with some legacy code in .NET Framework.
Collaborate closely with the Product Manager and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Evaluate the technical feasibility of proposed features and actively participate in strategic planning.
Drive the adoption of best practices, code quality standards, and continuous improvement within the team.
Mentor developers, conducting regular code reviews and providing constructive feedback to foster professional growth.
Actively contribute to modernizing the product, including UI upgrades, reducing technical debt, and rebranding efforts.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
5+ years of professional software development experience, with significant experience in .NET Core and exposure to legacy .NET Framework codebases.
Solid understanding of Angular for frontend development.
Proven experience leading technical teams or projects, demonstrating strong people skills and the ability to inspire team members.
Excellent grasp of software development best practices, architectural patterns, and agile methodologies.
Strong analytical skills, with the capability to evaluate business requirements and propose viable technical solutions.
Fluent in English, with clear communication skills in both understanding and speaking.

Preferred Skills:

Experience working in distributed teams with international collaboration.
Familiarity with tools for reducing technical debt and legacy system modernization.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Opportunity to be a central part of major product transformations.
A collaborative international environment with clear strategic goals.
Competitive compensation and professional growth opportunities
Opportunity to go work on-site in Norway
Work only 7.5 hours per day, from Mon – Fri
Allowances: Lunch, Fuel, and Internet
Company trip, Year End Party
Weekly entertainment activities: Football, Badminton
Monthly events such as birthday party, team building dinner, and other special events

jobs.title: IT Project Manager
jobs.location: Quận Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
We are looking for an experienced and technically strong IT Project Manager to join LG CNS Vietnam Build Center. As a PM, you will be responsible for managing software development projects for global clients (mainly Korean and international enterprises). A solid technical foundation in mobile or web development is required to effectively lead the development team and communicate with stakeholders.Trách nhiệm công việc
Manage the end-to-end lifecycle of IT projects including planning, execution, monitoring, and delivery.
Lead and coordinate a cross-functional development team including developers, testers, and business analysts.
Work closely with clients and LG CNS Korea HQ to gather requirements, define scope, and align expectations.
Ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.
Identify project risks and develop mitigation plans.
Ensure high quality of deliverables by managing code quality, testing, and deployment processes.
Prepare and maintain all project documentation (project plans, reports, meeting minutes, etc.)
Mentor and guide junior team members.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn[Required]

Bachelor's degree in information technology, Computer Science, or related field.
At least 5 years of experience in software development and 3+ years in project management roles.
Strong technical background with hands-on experience in at least one of the following:
iOS (Swift/Objective-C)
Android (Kotlin/Java)
Java (Spring Framework, J2EE)
.NET (C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core)
Experience in Agile/Scrum or Waterfall project management methodologies.
Good communication and leadership skills.
Fluent in English (both written and spoken).

[Nice to have]

Experience working with Korean clients or in Korean companies.
PMP, Scrum Master, or other PM certifications is a plus.
Experience managing offshore or distributed teams.
Korean language proficiency is a strong advantage.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Attractive salary and bonus will be discussed after going through CV & Interview
Topik allowance
Review capacity annually and adjust salary increases according to work performance.
Health care: Premium health insurance, Annual health check-up
Young working environment
Good career development opportunities with interesting and challenging projects.
English, Korean, technical, soft skills training courses.
Opportunity to learn special courses from LG CNS, new technology and security.
Gifts on holidays (April 30th - May 1st, September 2nd, Tet, etc.)
Outdoor activities with company support: sports clubs, team building, happy hour parties, birthdays, travel, employee and family events, etc.
Working hours: 8 hours from Monday - Friday (8 hours/day)

Hiring Process

Book an Interview Schedule with HR manager.
1st interview with VN Senior Leaders (Offline meeting room)
2nd Interview with Kr Senior PM (Online meeting room) *
If passed, negotiate salary and bonus.
Confirm onboarding Date.

jobs.title: Software Sales Manager
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
The Software Sales Manager require to drive revenue growth by selling software solutions. This role involves strategic planning, pipeline management, and fostering client relationships. The manager collaborates with cross-functional teams to align sales strategies with market needs and company goals.Trách nhiệm công việc1. Strategic Sales Planning  

Develop and execute sales strategies to meet revenue targets.  
Analyze market trends, competitor activity, and customer feedback to refine approaches.  
Identify new markets and opportunities for expansion.  

2. Team Leadership & Development  

Recruit, train, and mentor sales representatives.  
Set performance metrics, conduct reviews, and provide coaching.  
Foster a collaborative and results-driven team culture.

3. Sales Pipeline Management

Oversee the entire sales cycle, from lead generation to closing deals.  
Monitor pipeline health and forecast sales accurately.  
Utilize CRM tools (e.g., Salesforce) to track progress and optimize workflows.  

4. Client Relationship Management  

Build and maintain relationships with key clients and stakeholders.  
Address customer needs, resolve issues, and ensure high satisfaction.  
Negotiate contracts and manage renewal processes.  

5. Cross-Functional Collaboration  

Partner with Marketing to align campaigns with sales goals.  
Work with Product teams to relay customer insights and influence roadmap priorities.  

6. Performance Analysis & Reporting

Track KPIs (e.g., conversion rates, quota attainment) and adjust strategies as needed.  
Present detailed reports to senior leadership on sales performance and forecasts.  

7. Industry & Budget Management  

Stay updated on software industry trends and emerging technologies.  
Manage the sales budget, ensuring cost-effective resource allocation.  
Kỹ năng & Chuyên mônQualifications & Requirements

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Software or related field.  
Experience: Minimum 2 years in software sales, including at least1 years in leadership.  
Skills: Proficiency in CRM tools, proven track record of exceeding targets, having Digital Map knowledge an advantage. 
Must be able to speak English 

Skills & Competencies

Leadership & Team Motivation  
Strategic Thinking & Problem-Solving  
Excellent Communication & Negotiation  
Data-Driven Decision-Making  
Adaptability in Fast-Paced Environments  
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Competitive salary with commission/bonus structure.  
Professional development opportunities.  
Quy trình phỏng vấnVòng 1Online interview with HR & Manager (1 round only)

jobs.title: Chuyên viên Kiểm thử phần mềm (Tester)
jobs.company: Công ty Dịch vụ Số Bưu điện (Vietnam Post Digital)
jobs.location: Quận Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội
jobs.salary: Đăng nhập để xem mức lương
jobs.description:
Công ty Dịch vụ Số Bưu điện (Vietnam Post Digital) là một trong những đơn vị trẻ tuổi nhất thuộc Tổng công ty Bưu điện Việt Nam. VNPD được thành lập vào đầu năm 2022 với đội ngũ nhân sự trẻ, năng động, sáng tạo cùng ban lãnh đạo dày dặn kinh nghiệm trong mảng tài chính, ngân hàng và trung gian thanh toán.
Vietnam Post Digital xác định rõ mục tiêu xây dựng hệ sinh thái sản phẩm dịch vụ số, khép kín dòng tiền của Bưu điện Việt Nam. Ví điện tử PostPay là một trong những sản phẩm cốt lõi được triển khai bởi VNPD nhằm đáp ứng mọi hoạt động và nhu cầu thanh toán thiết yếu của người dùng, đặc biệt là người dân tại địa bàn vùng sâu vùng xa, khó tiếp cận với dịch vụ tài chính và thanh toán không dùng tiền mặt.
"Nhân sự là cốt lõi của doanh nghiệp" - Vietnam Post Digital đang tìm kiếm những mảnh ghép nhiệt huyết và tài năng, chúng tôi tin bạn chính là ứng viên tiềm năng!

Vị trí: Chuyên viên Kiểm thử phần mềm (Tester)
Mức lương: 15.000.000 VNĐ – 35.000.000VNĐ
Số lượng tuyển dụng: 03
Địa điểm làm việc: Số 5 Phạm Hùng, Mỹ Đình 2, Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội
Trách nhiệm công việc
Viết test case hoặc test checklist (liên quan test chức năng + test API + test lưu DB đúng bảng đúng giá trị vào các trường thông tin).
Thực hiện test căn cứ vào test case hoặc test checklist.
Phối hợp tốt với developer để fix bug.
Thực hiện SIT, Pilot, UAT với đối tác Bank/TGTT khác.
Xây dựng tài liệu hướng dẫn sử dụng (khi yêu cầu).
Chuẩn bị Slide đào tạo mạng lưới
Đào tạo nghiệp vụ, sử dụng dịch vụ cho các đơn vị liên quan.
Sử dụng Postman hoặc SOAPUI để test API.
Sử dụng tốt Oracle hoặc SQL server trong quá trình test. 
Đọc tốt tài liệu Tech Specs để lên test case test API.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên mônKiến thức/Kinh nghiệm:  

Yêu cầu tối thiểu 1 - 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các dự án phát triển ứng dụng/web với vai trò Tester hoặc BA.
Đã có bằng Cao đẳng/Đại học chuyên ngành Điện tử - Viễn thông, CNTT hệ chính quy trở lên.

Kỹ năng làm việc: 

Có kinh nghiệm phát triển test plan, test case, report.
Có kinh nghiệm làm Automation Test (API, Web, Mobile, Performance, Security ...)
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các mô hình quản lý dự án: Agile scrum, Waterfall
Thành thạo sử dụng các công cụ test: Postman, JMeter ...
Nắm chắc các kiến thức Testing cơ bản theo chuẩn ISTQB.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Thu nhập: 15.000.000 VNĐ – 25.000.000 VNĐ (Junior); 25.000.000 VNĐ – 35.000.000 VNĐ (mid-level)
Được xét tăng lương theo định kỳ hoặc theo năng lực không giới hạn thời gian.
Thưởng lễ, Tết, phụ cấp ăn trưa,... theo chế độ của Công ty.
Du lịch nghỉ mát 01 lần/năm.
Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo theo lĩnh vực chuyên môn của Tổng công ty ở trong nước và nước ngoài.
Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, trẻ trung, năng động.
Đóng BHXH, BHYT, BH sức khỏe và hưởng các chế độ theo quy định của Nhà nước.
Thời gian làm việc: 8h – 18h từ Thứ 2 – thứ 5; 8h – 17h thứ 6.
Khám sức khoẻ hàng năm
Tiệc gắn kết nhân viên
Sẽ được cung cấp đầy đủ trang thiết bị làm việc sau khi ký HĐLĐ
Nhiều hoạt động thể thao của công ty (cầu lông, bóng đá...) được tổ chức hàng năm.
Hỗ trợ chi phí ăn trưa.
